title: [Neuroscience] Research found that blood markers of two saturated fatty acids, along with certain omega-6, -7 and -9 fatty acids, correlated with better scores on tests of memory and were associated with larger brain structures in the frontal, temporal, parietal and insular cortices

[Health] Most of the SARS-CoV-2 symptoms disappeared completely after receiving ProLectin-M treatment for 7 days in more patients compared to the placebo group. A promising new drug being trialed for Covid.
